des:
NEW AND EXCLUSIVE TO ECHO SHOW DEVICES!

Play the classic Klondike solitaire card game on your Echo Show device today!

FEATURES
• Entirely free-to-play, no ads
• Touch-based interactions to move cards
• Option to draw 1 or 3 cards
• Keep track of time elapsed, number of moves made, and score

HOW TO PLAY
• The goal of the game is to stack all of the cards sequentially from Ace to King by suit on the foundation piles. These are the four piles on the right. Each has its own suit.
• Tap the deck on the left to draw cards. Tap that spot again when it's empty to draw more.
• A card can be moved to one of the seven piles in the center if it is one lower in rank and the opposite color of the card there. Only Kings can be moved to empty piles.
• Multiple cards can be moved at the same time between center piles as long as the entire group you are moving is in descending order and opposite colors.
• Drag cards to move them to the center piles. Double-tap a card to automatically move it to a foundation pile.

SCORING
• 10 points for each card moved to a foundation pile
• 5 points for each card moved from the deck to a center pile
• 5 points for each card turned over in the center piles
• -15 points for each card moved back from a foundation pile to a center pile
• -2 points every 10 seconds
• -20 points for each pass through the deck if 1 Draw option
• -100 points for each pass through the deck after three passes if 3 Draw option
• Bonus points for how quickly you win the game

Classic Solitaire is only supported on the Echo Show 10, Echo Show 8 and Echo Show 5.
